metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1872 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to102.0.5005.61 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to bypass downloads policy via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
